LowPassFilterData
struct
LowPassFilterData

Contains the data for the InertialNode::setLowPassFilterSettings API call.

ManualFilterBandwidthConfig

The enum for the different data descriptors.

SET_TO_HALF_REPORTING_RATE = 0X00 USER_SPECIFIED_CUTOFF_FREQ = 0x01

LowPassFilterData
LowPassFilterData() : dataDescriptor(MipTypes::ChannelField::CH_FIELD_SENSOR_SCALED_ACCEL_VEC), manualFilterBandwidthConfig(SET_TO_HALF_REPORTING_RATE), applyLowPassFilter(true), cutoffFrequency(0)
LowPassFilterData
LowPassFilterData(
MipTypes::
ChannelField 
descriptor
) : dataDescriptor(descriptor), manualFilterBandwidthConfig(SET_TO_HALF_REPORTING_RATE), applyLowPassFilter(true), cutoffFrequency(0)
dataDescriptor
MipTypes::ChannelField dataDescriptor

the data descriptor these settings apply to

Valid values (depending on device support):

CH_FIELD_SENSOR_SCALED_ACCEL_VEC  = 0x8004 CH_FIELD_SENSOR_SCALED_GYRO_VEC  = 0x8005 CH_FIELD_SENSOR_SCALED_MAG_VEC  = 0x8006 CH_FIELD_SENSOR_SCALED_AMBIENT_PRESSURE  = 0x8017

CH_FIELD_ESTFILTER_ESTIMATED_LINEAR_ACCEL  = 0x820D CH_FIELD_ESTFILTER_ESTIMATED_ANGULAR_RATE  = 0x820E CH_FIELD_ESTFILTER_COMPENSATED_ACCEL  = 0x821C

manualFilterBandwidthConfig
ManualFilterBandwidthConfig manualFilterBandwidthConfig

The ManualFilterBandwidthConfig to use.

applyLowPassFilter
bool applyLowPassFilter

applies low-pass filter if set to true.

cutoffFrequency
float cutoffFrequency

Sets the cutoff frequency, only if manualFilterBandwidthConfig == USER_SPECIFIED_CUTOFF_FREQ

getDataDescriptorForCommand
static uint8 getDataDescriptorForCommand(
MipTypes::
ChannelField 
descriptor
)

Formats the given MipTypes::ChannelField data descriptor to be written to a <ByteStream> command.

Parameters
descriptor
MipTypes::ChannelField

the MipTypes::ChannelField to format

Returns
uint8

the provided descriptor cast to uint8

getDataDescriptorFromUint8
static MipTypes::ChannelField getDataDescriptorFromUint8(
uint8 
descriptor
)

Gets the MipTypes::ChannelField data descriptor represented by the given uint8 descriptor.

Parameters
descriptor
uint8

the uint8 data descriptor

Returns
MipTypes::ChannelField

the provided descriptor cast to MipTypes::ChannelField

LowPassFilterConfig

A vector of LowPassFilterData objects
